about_the_game:
"Dwelling" is a spine-chilling first-person horror game that plunges you into the heart of an abandoned school where terrifying and unexplainable events unfold. Step into the shoes of a relentless police officer, determined to unravel the dark secrets lurking within these crumbling walls. Each floor of the school unveils new nightmares that will push your sanity to the brink. Can you survive the relentless evil forces that haunt these halls and uncover the sinister mysteries buried deep within?

Environment

"Dwelling" drags you into a nightmarish descent through an abandoned school filled with dread and despair. Wander through decaying classrooms, navigate shadowy hallways, and uncover the eerie remnants of a once-thriving institution now steeped in tragedy. The oppressive atmosphere closes in around you, blurring the line between reality and the horrifying events that once plagued this place. You’re alone—except for the malevolent presence that watches your every move.

Storyline

In "Dwelling," you embark on a harrowing journey through the haunted corridors of a forsaken school. Each room you enter is a gateway to the horrors of the past, and every shadow hides a terrifying truth. The desolate halls, void of life, trap you in a nightmare where the past and present collide in unimaginable ways. Can you piece together the twisted history of this cursed place before it consumes you?

Dark Entities

You are not alone. The vengeful spirits of the school’s former students stalk you relentlessly, lurking in the darkness, waiting to strike. They are drawn to your fear, manipulating your senses and driving you to the brink of madness. Why do they target you? What ties you to their eternal torment? Only by facing the horrors head-on will you uncover the chilling truth.

Gameplay

In "Dwelling," you are utterly defenseless against the malevolent forces that pursue you through every darkened corridor. Your only chance at survival lies in your wits—interact with the environment, gather crucial items, and piece together the clues that could either save you or plunge you deeper into the nightmare. Death is not an escape; it’s a lesson. Fear is your enemy, and the entities that stalk you thrive on it. Keep your mind sharp, stay in the light, and avoid the descent into madness at all costs.

Mature Content Description

"Dwelling" doesn’t shy away from the horrors of the human psyche. It delves into disturbing themes, portraying graphic violence and exploring the darker aspects of mental instability and supernatural terror. This game is not for the faint of heart—player discretion is advised.

content_descriptors.notes: "Dwelling" contains intense and realistic violence and horror, which can be very disturbing. The game explores dark themes, including supernatural occurrences and tragic deaths. Some scenes may involve graphic violence and unsettling imagery. This content is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all ages.

name: Dwelling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i5-9600 or Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070, AMD RX 5700 XT, Intel Arc A580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: NO
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i7-10700K or Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080, AMD RX 6800 XT, Intel Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: NO

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: In "Dwelling," a police officer investigates terrifying events in an abandoned school. Uncover the truth, survive the horrors, and solve the mystery hidden within each floor.
